name: Magic Potion VR
description:
A VR Dungeon Escape Game

You’re a trapped wizard, and you need to escape from the dungeon. 

Find the recipe to make a magical potion that will activate the portal to escape by acquiring all the ingredients and mixing them in the right order.

Developed by Jasmin Liang, Dean Yang, Yeonseo Lee, and Yii Liu.

Gameplay Demo
